CustomField.description: When the 'Use Calculated Funnel Addition Target' checkbox is disabled, this value will be used for all users with the appropriate Role/Profile when generating Funnel Addition Target data for a given period.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the 'Use Calculated Funnel Addition Target' checkbox is disabled, this value will be used for all users with the appropriate Role/Profile when generating Funnel Addition Target data for a given period.
CustomField.label: Static Funnel Addition Target
